channel.title: Drop item, spawns npc
channel.description:
[b]First question:[/b] How u make like, if u drop an item it spawns an npc? Like if u drop the cats head :p, u spawned a cat at ground? I need case 87? That's drop item (for me) Help please, how i make that? I need maybe a void? HEEEEELP :confused:
[b]Second question:[/b] If i click "pickup-cat" u know how can i delete the npc then? I know how to add item and i know that i need to add first click npc but how to delete an npc?

item.title: Drop item, spawns npc
item.dc:creator: @holy_dang_it holy dang it
item.description:
@holy_dang_it wrote:

First question:
How u make like, if u drop an item it spawns an npc?
Like if u drop the cats head :p, u spawned a cat at ground?
I need case 87?
That’s drop item (for me)
Help please, how i make that?
I need maybe a void?
HEEEEELP

Second question:
If i click “pickup-cat” u know how can i delete the npc then?
I know how to add item and i know that i need to add first click npc but how to delete an npc?
